explains: n. 设备，器具；机构，组织；器官；评论性注释

sentences.en: One of the boys had to be rescued by firemen wearing breathing apparatus.
sentences.cn: 其中的一个男孩得由戴着呼吸设备的消防队员们营救。

sentences.en: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.cn: 他们缺少进一步研发这些技术设备的科技人员。

sentences.en: They devised an apparatus that connected a baby's pacifier to a counting device.
sentences.cn: 他们设计了一种将婴儿的奶嘴与计数装置连接起来的装置。
